name: Design Test Strategy
title: Design Test Strategy
task: Develop a comprehensive test strategy for a new product or feature.
goal: Ensure thorough testing coverage and quality assurance processes.
context: Project planning and test preparation phases.
details: Include test levels, types, tools, and entry/exit criteria.

name: Test Case Management
title: Test Case Management
task: Create and manage test cases for functional and non-functional requirements.
goal: Maintain comprehensive test coverage and traceability to requirements.
details: Include test case design techniques, review processes, and maintenance procedures.

name: Bug Triage Process
title: Bug Triage Process
task: Establish a bug triage process to prioritize and manage defects.
goal: Ensure efficient defect resolution and quality improvement.
context: Defect management and quality control activities.
details: Include severity classification, assignment criteria, and resolution tracking.

name: Automation Framework
title: Automation Framework
task: Design and implement a test automation framework for the project.
goal: Improve testing efficiency and enable continuous integration.
context: Test automation initiatives and CI/CD pipeline integration.
details: Include tool selection, framework architecture, and maintenance strategies.

name: Quality Metrics Reporting
title: Quality Metrics Reporting
task: Establish quality metrics and reporting for project stakeholders.
goal: Provide visibility into product quality and testing effectiveness.
context: Quality assurance monitoring and reporting activities.
details: Include test coverage, defect metrics, and quality dashboards.
